name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened Remastered Edition
name_original: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened Remastered Edition
description:
Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened Remastered Edition is an adventure game developed by Frogwares. It came out on 23-10-2008. It was published by Focus Home Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened Remastered Edition on PC.
